mapper.select: SELECT im.id, im.creator_id, im.del_flag, im.customer_name, im.region, im.business_type, im.licens_plate_number, im.parking_garage, im.make_and_model, im.status, im.inbound_date, im.clearance_team, im.pick_up_fee, im.settle_status, im.remark, oi.out_date, su.nick_name, gp.p_id, gp.day_or_month_price, gp.fixed_price, oi.out_date, CASE WHEN oi.out_date IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF( oi.out_date, im.inbound_date) + 1 ELSE DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, im.inbound_date) + 1 END AS in_day FROM inventory_management as im left join sys_user as su on im.creator_id = su.user_id left join out_inventory oi on im.id = oi.in_man_id and oi.del_flag = 0 left join xzt_garage_price as gp on im.parking_garage = gp.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
